title: The Chopping Block: Why the Once-Taboo MEV Is Now a Core Part of Ethereum - Unchained - Unchained
summary:
Sure! Here's a summary of the article in less than 256 tokens:

The hosts of "The Chopping Block" podcast discuss MEV (maximal extractable value) and its impact on the Ethereum ecosystem. Phil Daian, co-founder of Flashbots, joins the show to explain the concept of MEV and how it's being addressed. Flashbots is a decentralized liquidity pool that aims to provide a fair and censorship-resistant market for Ethereum traders. Daian explains how MEV is like "Alice in Wonderland" and how it's a problem that Flashbots is solving. The hosts also discuss the never-ending debate about MEV and whether it should be accepted, as well as the role of social norms in solving weaknesses in the Bitcoin ecosystem. Finally, they touch on the future of MEV and the potential for decentralized solutions like Suave to address the issue.

title: Trader Who Accurately Predicted 2023 Bitcoin Burst Updates Forecast on BTC and Ethereum - The Daily Hodl
summary:
Sure, here's a summary of the article in less than 256 tokens:

An analyst who accurately predicted this year's crypto turnaround has updated his forecast on Bitcoin and Ethereum. DonAlt says Bitcoin must hold the $19,000 support level to maintain its bullish trend, or else it could plunge to $15,500. If BTC holds above $19,000, DonAlt will take profits at $32,000. For Ethereum, DonAlt remains bullish but sees little resistance until the $2,200 area. He's mainly watching Bitcoin to ensure it holds its key support level before making decisions on other altcoins.

title: Ethereum holders shorting ETH in bull market should read this first - AMBCrypto News
summary: Ethereum (ETH) addresses with a non-zero balance have reached an all-time high, with the number of addresses exceeding 92 million. The proportion of addresses with a positive balance, or "number of addresses with a Non-Zero balance," has also increased to over 60%, indicating new investors are filling their wallets. Meanwhile, the percent supply in profit has crossed over 60%, with over 50% of the supply being profitable. Despite a decline in value, the ETH market cap in BTC terms remains relatively strong, with the RSI still in a bull trend.

title: Cryptocurrency Price Today: Popular Coins Like Bitcoin, Ethereum Reported Gains As Threshold Emerged As Biggest Loser - ABP Live
summary:
Here is a summary of the article in less than 256 tokens:

Popular cryptocurrencies like Bitcoin (BTC) and Ethereum (ETH) saw gains on Saturday, with BTC up 1.26% and ETH up 2.00%. Other altcoins also rose, with Gala (GALA) emerging as the biggest gainer, up 25.87%. Threshold (T) was the biggest loser, down 11.84%. The global crypto market cap stood at $1.06 trillion, up 2.02% in the last 24 hours.

title: Impressive ROI Calculator Feature Puts Big Eyes Coin Up With The Best Cryptos, Like Bitcoin And Ethereum - Analytics Insight
summary: Big Eyes Coin has launched a new ROI calculator feature that allows investors to visualize potential returns on their investments. The feature has impressed investors and has helped the coin stand out in a crowded industry. Big Eyes Coin has also raised $18 million in its presale and offers a 200% launch bonus to early investors. Bitcoin and Ethereum are also mentioned in the article as successful cryptocurrencies with notable features. Bitcoin is the largest cryptocurrency by market capitalization and name recognition, while Ethereum has a decentralized platform for creating decentralized applications.
